channel.title: Getting the void night at pest control to say pest points
channel.description:
Hey mopar dudes/dudettes.
my void night at pest when you open the shop or talk to him, it says "you have ##### pk points"
how to i change that to say pest points?
is this something in shopassistant?
not too keen on making npc's talk or show system messages atm.
Any help would greatly be appreciated, thanks.

item.title: Getting the void night at pest control to say pest points
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

In your character files what do pest control points save as?

Read full topic
